query:
SELECT pt.product_id, p.name as product_name, pt.language, pt.name as translated_name, LEFT(pt.description, 100) as description_preview
FROM product_translations pt
JOIN products p ON pt.product_id = p.id
WHERE p.category_id = 1
ORDER BY pt.product_id, pt.language;
command:

WHERE p.category_id = 1
ORDER BY pt.product_id, pt.language;
